DOC.brief_summary: This study seek evaluate efficacy safety ABT-493/ABT-530 participant Genotype 1 hepatitis C virus infection without cirrhosis
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety ABT-493/ABT-530 Subjects With Genotype 1 Infection
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , least 18 year age time screen . 2 . Screening laboratory result indicate HCV GT1 infection . 3 . Chronic HCV infection . 4 . Subject must HCV treatmentnaïve ( i.e. , patient never receive single dose approve investigational regimen ) treatmentexperienced ( failed prior IFN pegIFN without RBV , SOF plus RBV without pegIFN therapy ) . 5 . Subjects must noncirrhotic . Additional Inclusion Criteria GT1 HCV/HIV1 coinfected patient : 6 . HIV1 ART naïve CD4 ≥ 500 cells/mm3 ( CD4+ % ≥ 29 % ) Screening plasma HIV1 RNA < 1,000 copies/mL Screening least 12 month prior Screening . Or On stable , qualify HIV1 ART regimen least 8 week prior screen , CD4 ≥ 200 cells/mm3 ( CD4+ % ≥14 % ) Screening plasma HIV1 RNA < LLOQ Screening least 12 month prior Screening . 1 . History severe , lifethreatening significant sensitivity excipients study drug . 2 . Female pregnant , plan become pregnant study breastfeeding ; male whose partner pregnant planning become pregnant study . 3 . Recent ( within 6 month prior study drug administration ) history drug alcohol abuse could preclude adherence protocol opinion investigator . 4 . Positive test result Screening hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) . 5 . HCV genotype perform screen indicate coinfection one HCV genotype . 6 . Chronic human immunodeficiency virus , type 2 ( HIV2 ) infection .
